metadata.name: Command Line Execution with Suspicious URL and AppData Strings
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious command line execution that includes an URL and AppData string in the command line parameters as used by several droppers (js/vbs > powershell)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious command line execution that includes an URL and AppData string in the command line parameters as used by several droppers (js/vbs > powershell)

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: High References: https://www.hybrid-analysis.com/sample/3a1f01206684410dbe8f1900bbeaaa543adfcd07368ba646b499fa5274b9edf6?environmentId=100, https://www.hybrid-analysis.com/sample/f16c729aad5c74f19784a24257236a8bbe27f7cdc4a89806031ec7f1bebbd475?environmentId=100
